item.title: 大韩航空斥资 13 亿美元收购韩亚航空后推出新品牌
item.description: 大韩航空（Korean Air）周二推出了新的飞机涂装和企业品牌，该公司将与韩国竞争对手韩亚航空（Asiana Airlines）合并，成为亚洲最大的航空公司之一。【原文：Korean Air on Tuesday launched new aircraft livery and corporate branding that will be introduced across the airline as it combines with South Korean rival Asiana Airlines to become one of Asia's biggest carriers.】

item.title: 西班牙时装零售商 Mango 首席执行官表示正在适应美国关税政策
item.description: 西班牙时装零售商 Mango 首席执行官表示，该公司正在适应特朗普政府对从中国进口商品征收的关税，并可能重新考虑在美国这个第五大市场销售的产品类型。【原文：Spanish fashion retailer Mango is adapting to tariffs imposed by the Trump administration on imports from China and could rethink the types of products it sells in the U.S., which is its fifth-largest market, the company's chief executive said.】

item.title: 印度将近 300 名从东南亚诈骗中心获救的公民带回家
item.description: 印度政府表示，印度已将近 300 名国民遣送回国，他们被诱骗到包括缅甸在内的多个东南亚国家，以虚假工作机会为诱饵，在诈骗团伙中从事网络犯罪和其他欺诈活动。【原文：India has brought home nearly 300 of its nationals who were lured to various southeast Asian countries, including Myanmar, with fake job offers and made to engage in cybercrime and other fraudulent activities in scam compounds, the government said.】

item.title: 乐高销售额上升，更多购物者喜欢乐高积木
item.description: 乐高公司报告称，随着越来越多的购物者抢购其彩色塑料砖建筑套件，2024 年的销售额增长强劲，该玩具制造商称，它正在从竞争对手手中抢夺市场份额。【原文：Lego reported strong sales growth for 2024 as more shoppers snapped up its colourful plastic brick construction sets and the toymaker said it was taking market share from rivals.】

item.title: 部长表示，VinFast 计划在印尼全国安装电动汽车充电站
item.description: 印尼总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）周二会见了越南电动汽车制造商VinFast的代表，印尼投资部长表示，越南电动汽车制造商VinFast计划在全国安装多达10万个充电站。【原文：Indonesia's investment minister said that Vietnamese electric vehicle maker VinFast planned to install as many as 100,000 charging stations across the country, after President Prabowo Subianto met company representatives on Tuesday.】

item.title: 中国零售交易商拥抱 DeepSeek，向学者致敬
item.description: 如果你无法对抗他们，那就加入他们吧，这是中国母婴投资者的口头禅，他们正在拥抱 DeepSeek 和其他人工智能工具，这与去年政府打击计算机驱动的量化交易员形成了鲜明对比。【原文：If you cannot fight them, join them, is the mantra among Chinese mom-and-pop investors who are embracing DeepSeek and other artificial intelligence tools, in sharp contrast with last year's government crackdown on computer-driven quantitative traders.】

item.title: 如果欧洲建造千兆工厂，人工智能产业会出现吗？
item.description: 作为欧洲在人工智能领域追赶美国和中国战略的一部分，欧盟委员会正在筹集200亿美元建设四个 "人工智能千兆工厂"，但一些行业专家质疑建设这些工厂是否合理。【原文：The European Commission is raising $20 billion to construct four "AI gigafactories" as part of Europe's strategy to catch up with the U.S. and China on artificial intelligence, but some industry experts question whether it makes sense to build them.】

item.title: 瑞士上议院支持限制银行家薪酬的动议
item.description: 瑞士议会上院周一晚些时候以微弱优势支持一项动议，将银行家的年薪总额限制在 300 万至 500 万瑞士法郎（约合 340 万至 570 万美元）之间，这一数额大大低于目前最高薪银行家的收入。【原文：The Swiss upper house of parliament late on Monday narrowly backed a motion to limit bankers' total annual compensation to between 3 and 5 million Swiss francs ($3.4-5.7 million), a sum significantly below what the best-paid earn today.】

item.title: 英国多米诺比萨公布年度核心利润增长
item.description: 英国多米诺比萨集团周二公布的年度基本核心利润增长了约 4%，原因是折扣产品促进了订单的增加。【原文：Britain's Domino's Pizza Group reported an about 4% rise in underlying annual core profit on Tuesday, on increasing orders boosted by discount offerings.】

item.title: 汉高预计2025年销售额将继续增长
item.description: 德国消费品和粘合剂生产商汉高公司周二预测，2025年的有机销售额增长率将达到3.5%，理由是公司正在实施其增长议程，而此前该公司2024年的增长未能达到市场预期。【原文：Henkel forecast organic sales growth of up to 3.5% for 2025 on Tuesday, citing the implementation of its growth agenda, after the German consumer goods and adhesives maker's 2024 growth missed market expectations.】

item.title: 在贸易紧张局势和新竞争对手的冲击下，大众汽车对 2025 年的前景保持缄默
item.description: 大众汽车周二表示，预计 2025 年的营业利润率将从 2024 年的 5.9% 降至 5.5-6.5%，与其他竞争对手一样，对未来一年的前景作出了低调的展望，因为汽车行业正在与需求疲软、成本高企和一触即发的贸易紧张局势作斗争。【原文：Volkswagen on Tuesday said it expects an operating margin of 5.5-6.5% in 2025, from 5.9% in 2024, joining rivals in giving a muted outlook for the year ahead as the sector battles weak demand, high costs and simmering trade tensions.】

item.title: 阿布扎比 ADQ 公司获得物流公司 Aramex 的多数股权
item.description: 阿布扎比主权财富基金 ADQ 周二表示，在完成要约收购后，该基金目前持有物流公司 Aramex 58% 的股份。【原文：Abu Dhabi sovereign wealth fund ADQ on Tuesday said it now owns a 58% stake in logistics firm Aramex after completing a tender offer.】

item.title: 特朗普称将购买 "新特斯拉 "以示对马斯克的支持
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周二表示，他将购买一辆新的特斯拉汽车，以示对这家电动汽车制造商的掌门人及其盟友埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的支持。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Tuesday said he will buy a new Tesla car to show support for the electric carmaker's chief and his ally Elon Musk amid recent "Tesla Takedown" protests and the slump in the company's stock price.】

item.title: 欧洲 关税推高股市，但没有 "特朗普放水 "的迹象
item.description: Tom Westbrook 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook】

item.title: 南非银行 Absa 年度利润增长 10
item.description: 南非贷款机构 Absa 集团周二公布年度利润同比增长 10%，末期股息为每股 775 美分。【原文：South African lender Absa Group on Tuesday posted a 10% rise in annual profit from a year earlier and a final dividend of 775 cents per share.】

item.title: 据国家媒体报道，中国新鹏可能投资高达 138 亿美元开发仿人机器人
item.description: 据国家媒体报道，中国电动汽车制造商新鹏公司首席执行官周一表示，该公司将仿人机器人视为一个长期项目，并正在考虑进行大规模投资，投资额可能高达1000亿元人民币（约合138.0亿美元）。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle maker Xpeng sees humanoid robots as a long-term project and is considering large investments that could go up to 100 billion yuan ($13.80 billion), state media reported its CEO as saying on Monday.】

item.title: 美国私募基金要求美国证券交易委员会重新考虑詹斯勒时代的规则
item.description: 私募基金行业组织管理基金协会（Managed Funds Association）敦促美国证券交易委员会（SEC）改革或撤销过去四年来出台的法规。【原文：The Managed Funds Association, a private fund industry group, has urged the U.S. Securities Exchange Commission (SEC) to reform or withdraw regulations introduced over the past four years.】

item.title: 报告称，2024 年太阳能占美国新增电力的 84
item.description: 本周二发布的一份报告称，在去年美国电网新增发电量中，太阳能占84%，但在美国新政府的能源政策下，太阳能产业的未来将面临挑战。【原文：Solar energy accounted for 84% of new electricity generation capacity added to the U.S. power grid last year, but the industry faces a challenging future with the new U.S. administration's energy policies, a report published on Tuesday said.】

item.title: 印度尼西亚汽车销量自 2023 年 6 月以来首次实现增长
item.description: 印尼汽车协会周二公布的数据显示，2月份印尼汽车销量同比增长2.2%，这是自2023年6月以来的首次增长。【原文：Indonesia's car sales in February rose 2.2% year-on-year, the first growth recorded since June 2023, data from the country's car association showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国经济增长忧虑加剧市场抛售，亚洲股市下滑
item.description: 周二，亚洲股市跟随华尔街的走势大幅下跌，因为市场担心大范围的贸易战可能会削弱美国经济增长并导致经济衰退，这导致投资者转向避险的日元。【原文：Asian stocks took their cue from the Wall Street and fell sharply on Tuesday as worries mounted that a wide-ranging trade war could dent U.S. economic growth and result in a recession, leading skittish investors to the safe-haven Japanese yen.】

item.title: 渣打银行为超级富豪客户推出专属投资俱乐部
item.description: 渣打银行（Standard Chartered）周二表示，其全球私人银行部门推出了一个专为超高净值客户量身定制的投资平台。【原文：Standard Chartered , said on Tuesday that its global private banking unit had launched an investment platform specifically tailored for its ultra-high-net-worth clientele.】

item.title: 花旗下调美股配置评级
item.description: 花旗银行分析师将美股推荐评级下调至中性，并将中国股市评级上调，认为未来几个月美国经济可能不再超越世界其他国家。【原文：Analysts at Citi downgraded their U.S. stocks recommendation to neutral and upgraded China, figuring the U.S. economy may no longer outpace the rest of the world in the coming months.】

item.title: 巴拿马运河考虑铺设管道输送天然气，着眼于亚洲客户
item.description: 巴拿马运河管理者里夸尔特-巴斯克斯（Ricuarte Vasquez）周一表示，巴拿马运河正在探索建造一条管道，将液化石油气（LPG）输送到贸易通道上，日本被视为来自美国的天然气的最大潜在客户。【原文：The Panama Canal is exploring the construction of a pipeline to move liquefied petroleum gas (LPG) across the trade passage, canal administrator Ricuarte Vasquez said on Monday, with Japan seen as a top potential client for gas coming from the U.S.】

item.title: 在新日铁遭受 5.65 亿美元的打击后，日本企业必须习惯反向分手费
item.description: 继新日铁公司（Nippon Steel）以 149 亿美元竞购美国钢铁公司（U.S. Steel）陷入困境后，日本收购方面临着美国目标公司收取高额终止费的更大可能性，以防止交易因监管或政治原因而破裂。【原文：Japanese suitors face a heightened chance of U.S. targets baking in hefty termination fees to protect against a deal collapsing due to regulatory or political reasons, following Nippon Steel's stranded $14.9 billion bid for U.S. Steel .】

item.title: 对关税影响的担忧加剧，油价走低
item.description: 周二早盘，油价连续第二天下跌，原因是市场担心美国对加拿大、墨西哥和中国征收关税将导致全球经济放缓，并在欧佩克+增加供应的同时损害能源需求。【原文：Oil prices fell for a second day in early trade on Tuesday on worries that U.S. tariffs on Canada, Mexico and China would slow economies around the world and hurt energy demand while OPEC+ ramps up its supply.】

item.title: 美国交通部长将与波音公司就安全工作举行会谈
item.description: 美国运输部长肖恩-达菲（Sean Duffy）计划于周四参观位于华盛顿州的波音工厂，以确保美国飞机制造商保持最高的安全水平。【原文：U.S. Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy plans to visit a Boeing factory on Thursday in Washington State to ensure the U.S. planemaker is maintaining the highest level of safety.】

item.title: 明星公司正在与 Salter Brothers 洽谈高达 5.89 亿美元的再融资事宜
item.description: Star Entertainment 已向房地产基金管理公司 Salter Brothers 公开了其账目，以通过高达 9.4 亿澳元（5.8947 亿美元）的再融资方案为这家陷入困境的赌场公司的所有债务进行再融资。【原文：Star Entertainment has opened its books to property funds manager, Salter Brothers, to potentially refinance all the embattled casino firm's debt through an up to A$940 million ($589.47 million) refinancing package.】

item.title: CERAWEEK 伍德赛德首席执行官表示，路易斯安那液化天然气的投资决策可能推迟到第二季度做出
item.description: 澳大利亚伍德赛德液化天然气公司（Woodside LNG）首席执行官梅格-奥尼尔（Meg O'Neill）周一告诉路透社，由于出售该项目的一半股权的谈判迟迟没有结果，该公司可能会将路易斯安那液化天然气厂的最终投资决定推迟到2025年第二季度。【原文：Australia's Woodside LNG may push a final investment decision on its Louisiana liquefied natural gas (LNG) plant into the second quarter of 2025 as talks to sell half of the project drag on, CEO Meg O'Neill told Reuters on Monday.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，特朗普寻求在五角大楼基地提炼矿物以提高美国产量
item.description: 两名高级政府官员告诉路透社记者，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的目标是在五角大楼军事基地上建造金属精炼设施，作为他促进国内关键矿产生产和抵消中国对该行业控制的计划的一部分。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump aims to build metals refining facilities on Pentagon military bases as part of his plan to boost domestic production of critical minerals and offset China's control of the sector, two senior administration officials told Reuters.】

item.title: 日本 1 月家庭支出同比增长 0.8
item.description: 日本内务省周二公布的数据显示，1 月份日本家庭支出同比增长 0.8%，低于市场预期中值 3.6%。【原文：Japanese household spending rose 0.8% in January from a year earlier, internal affairs ministry data showed on Tuesday, worse than the median market forecast for a 3.6% rise.】
